wikipedia_page.main: Sarah Clarke (née Dobson, born in Coleraine) is a broadcast journalist from Northern Ireland, who works at UTV and U105.

response: Sarah Clarke (born 1972) is an American actress.
Sarah Clarke may also refer to:
* Sarah Clarke (nun) (1919-2002), Irish nun and civil rights campaigner
* Sarah Clarke (Black Rod) (born 1965), English administrator and current Black Rod
* Sarah Clarke, Minneapolis attorney and wife of mayor Jacob Frey
